statements: SELECT * FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, video_url FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM course_content WHERE course_id IN (3, 4);
SELECT course_name, pdf_url FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name, video_url, pdf_url FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 6;
SELECT course_name, video_url FROM course_content WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, pdf_url FROM course_content WHERE video_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_name, pdf_url FROM course_content WHERE JSON_LENGTH(interactive_modules) > 0;
SELECT course_name, video_url, pdf_url FROM course_content WHERE course_name LIKE '%Database%';
SELECT course_name, video_url, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(interactive_modules, '$.lesson1')) AS lesson1 FROM course_content WHERE PDF_URL IS NULL;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_name = 'SQL Basics';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_pdf_url FROM courses WHERE course_id > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_video_url FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT module_name, module_content FROM modules WHERE module_type = 'video';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT module_name, module_content FROM modules WHERE module_course_id = 1 ORDER BY module_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses JOIN modules ON courses.course_id = modules.module_course_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(module_id) AS num_modules FROM courses LEFT JOIN modules ON courses.course_id = modules.module_course_id GROUP BY course_name;
SELECT course_name, module_name, module_content FROM courses INNER JOIN modules ON courses.course_id = modules.module_course_id WHERE module_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, duration FROM pdfs WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, title FROM interactive_modules WHERE duration < 60 AND title ILIKE '%intro%';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title, duration FROM interactive_modules WHERE content->>'type' = 'quiz';
SELECT id, title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pdfs WHERE size < 1000 ORDER BY size DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, title, content FROM interactive_modules WHERE content->>'type' = 'quiz' ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, file_url FROM videos WHERE title ILIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactive_modules WHERE duration > 20 AND content->>'type' = 'video' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_id = 1;
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT pdf_id, title FROM pdfs WHERE size < 5000;
SELECT title, module_type FROM interactive_modules WHERE module_id = 3;
SELECT video_id, pdf_id, module_id FROM course_content WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT video_id, title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration > 300;
SELECT title, size FROM pdfs WHERE size < 1000;
SELECT module_id, title, module_type FROM interactive_modules WHERE module_type = 'quiz';
SELECT title, duration FROM videos WHERE duration BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT title, module_type FROM interactive_modules WHERE title LIKE '%chapter%';
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT title, type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT pdf_id, course_id, pdf_content FROM pdfs WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT title, video_url FROM videos WHERE video_id = 4;
SELECT question, options, correct_option FROM quizzes WHERE module_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT title, type FROM course_materials WHERE course_id > 2;
SELECT title, content FROM modules JOIN course_materials ON modules.course_id = course_materials.course_id WHERE modules.module_id < 5;
SELECT course_materials.title, videos.title, videos.video_url FROM course_materials JOIN videos ON course_materials.course_id = videos.course_id WHERE videos.video_id = 3;
SELECT pdfs.title, pdfs.pdf_content, course_materials.title FROM pdfs JOIN course_materials ON pdfs.course_id = course_materials.course_id WHERE pdfs.course_id = 4;
